A city that runs on 100% renewable energy: The perfect city would be powered entirely by renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal. This could include a network of buses, trains, and subways that are powered by electricity or hydrogen fuel cells, reducing emissions and improving air quality. The city could also invest in autonomous vehicles and advanced traffic management systems to reduce congestion and improve traffic flow.

The city could also invest in local food production and distribution systems to reduce carbon emissions from transportation and support local farmers.
